a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Based on the expert estimates and index by V-Dem, weighted by countries' populations. It combines information
on voting rights, the freedom and fairness of elections, freedoms of association and expression, as well as the
extent to which the protection of rights, access to power, and distribution of resources is equal. It ranges from 0 to
